description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In Elfland Reloaded, you take on the role of Elfie or Elfita to try and save the elf village from threatening trolls. On your quest, you will encounter helpful turtles, aggressive birds, bouncing springs, purple elf-eaters, and other assorted creatures. In the second volume, you will get the chance to defeat the Troll Chieftain, rescue the village elves, and receive the Elf Medal of Honor!
description.short: In Elfland Reloaded, you take on the role of Elfie or Elfita to try and save the elf village from threatening trolls. On your quest, you will encounter helpful turtles, aggressive birds, bouncing springs, purple elf-eaters, and other assorted creatures. In the second volume, you will get the chance to defeat the Troll Chieftain, rescue the village elves, and receive the Elf Medal of Honor!
